FuncDef: This command determines the interval to wait for a RADIUS reply message from the RADIUS server before a RADIUS server is declared out-of-service. By default, the value of the down-timeout is the number of retries multiplied by the timeout interval. Each host will use the configured timeout and retry value under the AAA RADIUS server policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the timer to wait, in minutes, before declaring the RADIUS server that is down. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the timer to wait, in seconds, before declaring the RADIUS server that is down. Values-1 to 5.
